item.title: Hugo Basics
item.description: Create New Post When we need post new something, open your terminal in your hugo project folder and write the command below. hugo new posts/new-file.md and hugo automatically create file like this +++ title = 'Hugo Basics' date = 2024-07-30T21:35:06+03:00 draft = false +++

item.title: MarkDown Guide
